polis mulasthanaye regulasi walata anuwa ek parlimenthu manthi‡∑ärawarayeku sadaha amathi aarakshaka anshayen samajikayin dedeneku wenkere.ema parlimenthu manthi‡∑ärawaraya niwase sitina awasthawaka ohuge aarakshawa pilimbaada wagakiwayuthu wanne adala pa‡∑äradeshaye polis sthanayayi.hitapu janadhipathiwarayata komando aarakshawada sapaya thibunu athara pasugiya senasurada dinaye sita ema katayuthu bhara kara aththe wishesha karyabalakayataya.wancha ha duushana ka‡∑äramayen heli wemin pawathina samayaka eewata hawulwi athayi chodana labasitina pudgalayinge wairayata patha‡∑ärawiya haki nisa janapathi sirisena menma agamathi wika‡∑äramasinhath thama thamange aarakshaka katayuthu gana miita wada salakilimathwiya yuthuwa atha.

ethakota okkoma kuppa wada nithyanukulayi newa üòÄ ape rate deshapalakayawa sampurnayenma narak karala thiyenne niladharin wisinuyi.deshapalakaya ge karya mahajanathawage prashna rajaye niladharinta gena eemayi.niladharin inne eeprashna wisadanna.prashna wisadanna oonakarana puhunuwa danuma ehema oya niladharita dila thiyenne.adaksha niladharinta prashnawisadanna bariwenakota deshapalakayata eeka therenawa.miniha eelangata prashnearagena enne eyata oona uththareth ekkayi.miniha kiynawa menna prashne mekata meuththare thiyanawa eekata athsana gahala denna kiyala.ara moda niladhariya athsan karala denawa.ehema unama desha palakayata sathutuyi.ayi thamanta oona uththare mekiyana niladharingen gaththakine.eeta passe niladhariyatath salakanawa.eekata rawatila wadiwadiyen oona uththra walata athsan karanawa.ookathamayi thathwe.
